alert.note: Alert for Florence; Marion; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 3:29PM EDT until July 13 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL FLORENCE...WEST CENTRAL MARION AND NORTH CENTRAL WILLIAMSBURG COUNTIES... At 328 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Pamplico, Hyman, Hannah, Mars Bluff, Cades, Poston, Francis Marion University, Gresham, Friendfield, Claussen, New Hope, Evergreen, Kingsburg, Brittons Neck, Scranton, Coward and Lake City Community Hospital. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
